title: Family Crisis

en: My mom is calling. She says it's 'an emergency,' and you know how those go. Can you please handle this? After my last fight with her, I don't know if I can talk to her.

no_caption: She's *your** mother. Be an adult and handle it.

en: none::You hate joining these calls with Skylar's difficult mother, but you know the consequences for not helping out would be much worse than the benefits of not doing it.
none::You know the annoying conversation will last the entire night, and you really can't be bothered to deal with this nonsense. Skylar looks at you with exasperation.
